author: Daily Herald report
title: Bowen Park Theatre auditions
text:
The Waukegan Park District's Bowen Park Theatre is holding an open call for the play, "Agnes of God," that will be on the Schornick stage in late January and into February. Auditions are Sunday, Oct. 18, noon to 5:30 p.m., and Monday, Oct. 19, 5:30 to 9 p.m. at the Schornick Theatre in Goodfellow Hall, 39 Jack Benny Drive, Waukegan. Actors are asked to bring in a headshot and résumé to the audition and to prepare a two-minute dialogue. The audition will include a cold read from the script and singing a short hymn. Actors are invited to set up an audition time by contacting the Jack Benny Center for the Arts at (847) 360-4740 or by contacting staff at cfreeman@waukeganparks.org. The play is scheduled for Jan. 29, 30, and Feb. 5, 6, 7, 12, 13, 14. Curtain is at 8 p.m., with a 3 p.m. curtain for Sunday matinees Feb. 7 and 14.
 News Community Theater Waukegan Park District
